The '''Virtuous Share Bundle''' is available as part of the [[Adventurer's Instructional Bundle]], which can be purchased in the [[Gift Shop]] section in the Shop at limited times.

One of the following can be selected upon using this item:
{{Card|Guide to Freedom|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Resistance|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Ballad|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Prosperity|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Diligence|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Gold|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Transience|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Elegance|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Light|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Admonition|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Ingenuity|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Guide to Praxis|1|show_caption=1}}
